title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Duration (Alternative Calendar Extended Format)
description: A duration in alternative extended format P[YYYY-MM-DD]T[HH:MM:SS] (ยง5.5.2.4). This schema prevents invalid month/day combinations (e.g., February 30, April 31) but does not validate leap years.

anyOf.$comment: Months with 31 days: January (01), March (03), May (05), July (07), August (08), October (10), December (12)
Months with 30 days: April (04), June (06), September (09), November (11)
February (02) with days 01-29 (leap year validation is delegated to consumers)
